description.value:
Designate a single creature that you can see or hear, or whom you've spent a significant amount of time studying and reading about from afar (subject to the GM's approval), and who you know to be an agent of Treerazer. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Seek] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Sense Motive]{Sense the Motive} of this creature. This creature takes a –1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against spells or effects you create; this penalty increases to –2 against effects that have the holy trait.

You can have only one creature designated by Hunt the Razer's Pawn at a time. If you use this ability against a creature when you already have one designated, the prior creature loses the designation and the new creature gains the designation. This lasts until your next daily preparations.
